description:
fail to live-migrate a booted from volume vm which have a local disk.

<Error Message>
message: "hostA is not on shared storage: Live migration can not be used without shared storage except a booted from volume VM which does not have a local disk."

make it enable by copying local files (swap, ephemeral disk, config-drive) from the source host to the destination host in pre_live_migration.
title: fail to live-migrate a booted from volume vm which have a local disk.
